<p></p>
Our team primarily deploys passive acoustic recorders on subsurface moorings throughout the Bering, Beaufort, and Chukchi Seas, as well as in the Gulf of Alaska.  We also conduct real-time passive acoustic monitoring via sonobuoys while underway.|
:::
